properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
FRANCE.
DNC 08.
12 METER S/V STELA, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
FLOODING IN 42-32.59N 006-43.69E. PERSONS
ENTERING LIFERAFT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC LA GARDE,
TELEX: 430024, PHONE: 334 9461 1616,
FAX: 334 9427 1149, E-MAIL: LAGARDE@MRCCFR.EU.
